aja.about_page:
AJA is the first international Armenian professional trade Association since Armenia’s independence and the pride of Armenian jewellers worldwide.
Founded in 1997, AJA offers the ideal opportunity and platform to all Armenian jewellers to connect, network and support one another as well as the burgeoning jewellery industry in Armenia.
Joining AJA isn't just about being part of an association; it's about being part of a movement that shapes the destiny of Armenian jewelry.
All Armenians working in the industry are welcome to join the association as corporate or individual members by completing the registration form.
If AJA didn’t exist it had to be created!
Join the movement and shape the future․
aja.reg_page:
Since its inception in 1997, the Armenian Jewelers Association (AJA) has served as the catalyst for numerous partnerships and business relationships among its members, standing as a source of pride for our industry and nation.

By becoming a member, you invigorate the spirit of our organization and actively contribute to its revival. We invite you to join us in becoming a member, empowering not only yourself but also our community.

why_goldcenter.title: Why Choose Gold Center?
why_goldcenter.descriptions: The platform features a wide selection of jewelry from only registered sellers and manufacturers. Here you can find all the jewelry related services you need.
why_goldcenter.first_reason: We bring together a community of highly trusted and pre-qualified Armenian jewelers, Silver and Goldsmiths, and artisans who have earned a reputation for operating with transparency, integrity, and the highest industry standards.
why_goldcenter.second_reason: Gold Center offers a quality assurance guarantee for every piece of jewelry sold online or in person. Our experienced gemstone & jewelry experts will inspect each item for authenticity check using cutting-edge laser scanning devices. We accompany a certificate of guarantee with each item shipped to customers.
why_goldcenter.third_reason: Find the perfect piece in a vast world of fine silver or gold jewelry collections with styles and categories for everyone — And yes, we proudly promote brands with jewelry designs inspired by Ancient Armenian symbols, crosses, and the letters of the Armenian alphabet.
why_goldcenter.fourth_reason: Our customers can make informed purchasing decisions by checking unbiased seller ratings and reviews from previous transactions. Our main goal is to empower your peace of mind when shopping online with us, knowing you’ve got valuable insights right at your fingertips.

watches.title: BUY WATCHES ONLINE
watches.subtitle:
Discover a world of new and original timepieces!
From classic or sports designs to diamond-set dress styles, we surely have something for everyone.
Our team of experts thoroughly inspects each timepiece, who verify their authenticity and meticulously services them to guarantee they meet our stringent in-house standards.
You can trust that every watch we offer is authentic and in excellent working order.
We introduce the best place to buy a watch online and elevate your wrist game to the next level!

souvenir.title: SOUVENIRS ONLINE
souvenir.subtitle:
Discover souvenirs made from solid gold and sterling silver. Browse our wide range of products, including gold and silver bars, commemorative coins custom carved, silver and solid gold pens.
Souvenir Coins
Buy a commemorative coin custom made to mark a special event, souvenir pennies or tourist coins as mementos of your travels, or unique gold foreign coins to add to your coin book collection.
Gold and Silver Bars
Our gold minted bullion bars, and mini gold bars are perfect for those who want to invest in precious metals. Every gold bar is made of 24-karat gold and has a fineness of 999.9. All sealed packagings are original and tested by our team for guaranteed counterfeit-proof.
Silver Vintage Jewelry
Step back in time with our stunning collection of vintage-style and antique-inspired jewelry. Our selection of silver vintage jewelry is perfect for anyone looking to add a touch of old-world charm to your wardrobe! Each piece is carefully crafted to create an authentic look and feel.
Metal Pens
Make your signature writing more elegant with our premium metal pens, available in silver and solid gold. Our silver pens are perfect for those looking for a sleek and modern design, while our solid gold pens exude luxury. Each pen is smooth to the touch, making them ideal for sealing an important deal.

guarantee.0: Once you’ve shopped around and decided on the jewelry piece you want, consider another detail: a jewelry guarantee. We use modern laser scanning machines to test the jewelry and provide a certificate at the end. Every piece of jewelry that goes through our guarantee checking v-text-line-clamp="1" is examined by Goldcenter experts who carefully inspect the item to confirm the authenticity of it.
guarantee.2: The laser test is performed with state-of-the-art German devices, it is checked in just a few seconds without damaging the jewelry.This comprehensive approach enhances the accuracy and reliability of our assessments, giving you complete confidence.
guarantee.7: With our devices we also have the opportunity to check 1-100 g /as a gift/ 999.9 grade bars, packaged, without damaging them:
guarantee.12: After receiving the guarantee, you will be able to sell your jewelry any day at the prices set for the given day in our reception points, which you can follow through this site. The warranty on the outer layer of the scarf is usually guaranteed, but our diverse experience allows us to test not only its outer layer, but also its entirety.

about_us.title: ABOUT US
about_us.content:
We are a unique online platform that brings together Armenian goldsmiths and silversmiths in one place.

The site ensures the security and data protection of online shopping, as every online transaction is encrypted and monitored by a special banking system. The platform is distinguished by several advantages, such as guaranteed verification, price offers, implementation of individual orders, a wide selection of payment systems, availability of a large selection, cooperation with famous brands.

Our goal is to support Armenian manufacturers by presenting their products all over the world, creating partnership relations for them in B2B format.

Goldcenter.am website presents jewelry from reliable and leading sellers in Armenia. Each piece of jewelry that is sold on our platform is examined by Goldcenter.am experts using special devices, who confirm the authenticity and provide a certificate of guarantee. This approach increases the reliability of estimates, ensuring complete accuracy.

We allow Armenian goldsmiths and silversmiths to present themselves all over the world, displaying their products in leading international markets.

We strive to increase the trust and reliability of Armenian products.

By ensuring high demand and large availability, we will be able to take leading positions in the global market.

At Goldcenter.am, we believe that Armenian jewelry will have a bright future, and the promotion of our online platform will contribute to the development and establishment of this industry.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.content:
What types of jewelry do you offer?
We offer authentic Armenian handmade jewelry in real sterling silver and 14K gold using various kinds of precious stones and materials.
How can I register on the website?
On the website’s top right corner, locate the LOGIN button. Under the "Registration" section in the pop-up screen, you can create your account and unlock the world of exquisite jewelry.
What payment methods do you accept?
Currently, payments are accepted through Visa, MasterCard, ArCa cards, as well as IDram and Telcell payment systems.
Can I make purchases on the site without registering?
To shop on our site, you need to create a Goldcenter.am account. After registration, you can easily log into your account for future purchases. If you have already registered, you can simply log in using your email address and password.
If you have any questions or problems during registration, please contact us.
Is your website secure for online purchases?
Yes, 100% safe. We take data protection and safe e-commerce practices very seriously. Every online shopping transaction is securely encrypted and backed by a designated banking system.
How does the ordering process work?
Once you’ve made a purchase, Goldcenter.am stands between you and the seller as the guarantor to ensure a smooth transaction. If the seller is delaying the shipment of your item, and you disagree with their given ETA (estimated time of arrival), we will refund your order promptly.
How do I know if a piece of jewelry will fit me?
In addition to showcasing the jewelry through modeled photographs, we provide detailed information for each item in its product description. We also offer a size chart so that you can cross-reference the information for a more accurate measurement. This way, you can be confident that you are getting the right fit for your jewelry purchase.
How can I buy the jewelry at the price of my choice?
On our website, you have the opportunity to send a price offer, offering the price that suits you.
The store can agree, reject or send a new offer.
Feel free to send us your quote and we will do our best to meet your preferences.
What is your Returns Policy?
If the seller or manufacturer (B2B) offers a return option for the product(s), the buyer can return it for any reason without explanation.
All jewelry is accompanied by a guarantee certificate. If the buyer encounters any other quality issues, they can work with the seller to arrange a return or exchange.
If the product is damaged, the buyer has the right to return it. Goldcenter.am will assist in arranging a refund or replacement with the seller on your behalf.
The buyer can only return the product immediately after delivery by returning the product to the shipping company.
Refunds will be made as soon as possible and shipping costs will not be refunded. For more detailed information, you can refer to the Terms and Conditions section of the website.
What are the shipping terms and prices?
Delivery is carried out in the territory of Yerevan. The cost of delivery is 2500 drams, which is automatically calculated on the website.
How is jewelry inspected?
Every single piece of jewelry undergoes a hallmarking process indicating the exact purity of the item’s gold alloy (10K, 14K, 18K) or etched with 925 for Sterling Silver. Our team of knowledgeable experts will also use modern devices to double-check each item before it is shipped out, along with our certificate of guarantee.
Are diamond grading reports provided when purchasing diamond jewelry?
When you buy diamond jewelry through Goldcenter.am and the item in question comes with a diamond grading report from the GIA, AGS, IGI, EGL, or others — we will include that certificate when your item is shipped. If no grading reports are available, our experts will carry out a series of extensive testing to confirm if the diamond is a natural one or lab-grown.
Why can't I order multiple copies of the same jewelry?
You cannot order multiple copies of the same jewelry item because each piece is unique and crafted as a one-of-a-kind creation. Therefore, adding more than one quantity of the same item to your cart is impossible. If you wish to purchase several pieces of the same jewelry item, you'll need to place a pre-order in advance. This will ensure you'll receive the desired number of pieces when they become available.
Why can't I add products from different stores to the cart at the same time?
You cannot add products from different stores to your cart simultaneously because each store manages its own inventory and shipping processes. Therefore, when you place an order on our website, it's processed and fulfilled by the specific store from which you're purchasing.
You can add multiple products to your cart, but they must all be from the same store. This allows us to ensure that your order is processed and shipped to you as efficiently as possible and that you receive your items on time.
How do I contact customer support?
You can call us directly at +374 (44) 999-750 or connect with this number via WhatsApp or Viber. Our customer support is available from 10 AM to 6 PM on weekdays [UTC/GMT +4 hours] — for special orders or any questions we’ve left unanswered in this section, please send us an email to info@goldcenter.am
Can you accommodate custom orders?
Yes, you can benefit from custom-made jewelry orders if the seller in question allows such an option. You can access their contact information and request custom orders directly from them!
Who are the listed businesses on Goldcenter.am?
All businesses listed on our website are trustworthy and leading forces in Armenia’s silversmithing and goldsmithing industries. Via our B2B space, you can search and find manufacturers, service providers, and Armenian jewelry brands with whom you may easily get in touch for potential business partnerships.
How can I contact the company or manufacturer?
To get in touch with the company or manufacturer, first click on the <<Stores>> section and choose your preferred store. Then, on the right side of the website, you will see the “About the Store'' section.
Contact details are usually provided there, including the seller's name, phone number, seller's address and email address, allowing you to easily contact the store for any queries or assistance you may need.
In the "About the Store" section, you can get acquainted with the description of the store and other details, which will help you to be informed and establish trust between you and the seller.
Do you offer any tools to help me find the jewelry I want?
Yes, we have a filter section that you can find on our website. You can use various filters such as price, metal type, weight, color, presence of diamond or gemstones, carat weight (for diamonds), availability of certificate, etc. These filters will help you find the perfect piece of jewelry that matches your preferences.
How can I order jewelry in bulk?
Your first step will be to register on Goldcenter.am in order to gain access to all manufacturers and service providers we have partnered with via our B2B Space page.
Once you find the company you want to work with, you can contact the company directly and discuss details on wholesale prices, import terms and costs.
Why should I purchase jewelry from Armenia?
Jewelry made in Armenia comes from a centuries-old tradition and techniques still used today by local master jewelers. Your business operations can benefit from a cost-effective labor force, highly competitive product pricing, and a rich assortment of jewelry from different categories. Lastly, your contribution directly impacts the development of this sector in Armenia’s economy.
FAQ.alert: For any further queries or assistance, feel free to contact our customer support at +374 (44) 999-750 or via WhatsApp and Viber. You can also reach us through email at info@goldcenter.am. We're here to help you make the perfect jewelry choice․

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
The present Privacy Policy constitutes an integral part of the Terms of Use – a legally binding agreement between you and “Armgoldcenter” LLC (a company registered and operating under the legislation of the Republic of Armenia, registration number: 264.110.1239170, TIN: 08224318, legal address: Kanaker-Zeytun, K. Ulnetsi str. 74, Republic of Armenia) (hereafter referred to as “Goldcenter”, “We”, “Us” or “Our”). Any capitalized terms and definitions not specifically defined herein shall have the meaning assigned to them in the Terms of Use.
This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) is aimed at informing Our users (“Users”, “Your” or “You”) of Our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of any kind of information We receive from Users of the GoldCenter platform (“Platform”) or collect through course of their use of the Platform. This Policy does not apply to websites, applications or services that display or link to different privacy policies or statements. We are not responsible for the actions of third-party people or companies, the content of their sites, the use of information You provide to them, or any products or services they may offer. Any link to those sites does not anyhow imply Our sponsorship of, or affiliation with, those people or companies.
By accessing or using the Platform, including when signing up on the Platform, You explicitly and irrevocably consent and agree to the collection, use and disclosure of information We receive from You or collect from You in relation to the access to and use of the Platform in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Please, note that stopping Your use of the Platform and/or unregistering Your account does not amount to a withdrawal of Your consent to process Your information, including Your personal data, already being processed by the time you stopped Your use of the Platform and/or unregistered Your account. Unregistering and not visiting the Platform prevents Us from further information gathering, but it neither renders unlawful the processing of Your information gathered before the unregistering, nor it results in deletion of Your information from Our system or servers.
In case You expect Your data to be removed or else deleted permanently from Our System or servers, please notify us of withdrawing your consent to data processing and exercise Your right to be forgotten as provided under this Privacy Policy, as per the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. Please note that even in such cases some of the data will be retained, as explained below.
Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. Please do not access or start using the Platform (including sign-up on the Platform) if You do not agree to any part of this Privacy Policy.
Updates and Modifications
GoldCenter reserves the right to update, change or modify any part of this Privacy Policy at any time, in its sole discretion, by posting changes on the Platform. GoldCenter will also give You an additional notice thereof, such as an e-mail message or messaging within the Platform. If You continue to use the Platform following the posting and notification of updates, changes or modifications, You thereby explicitly and irrevocably agree to and accept the updates, changes or modifications. Except as otherwise stated, all amended terms shall automatically be effective from the day they are initially posted.
If You at any point do not agree to any portion of then-current Privacy Policy, Your license to use the Platform shall immediately terminate, and You must immediately stop using the Platform.
Collection and Use of Information
In general, You can only view (browse) the pages of the Platform without concluding a contract. The only information We can gather during such general browsing is from standard server logs and information automatically collected via cookies. These include Your IP (Internet Protocol) address, domain name, browser type, operating system, and information such as the website that referred You to Us, the pages You visit, the dates/times of those visits, and other similar information. Please see below for more details regarding collection of information via server logs and cookies.
However, if You would like to explore the Platform any further, enjoy the benefits provided by the Platform and use the services that it offers, You will need to register with the Platform. To do this, You will need to provide Us with certain personal data which shall be used to identify your user account on the Platform, as well as ensure safe and prompt communication with You throughout Your use of the Platform and its functionalities.
Personal data submission of which is mandatory for registration, includes Your full name, e-mail address and phone number, which is also the registered number for Viber or WhatsApp applications. You will also be required to create a password to complete Your registration on the Platform. Your e-mail address will be used for communication between You and Us as well as for user account verification. Your phone number will be used for communication between You and Us or between You and the Seller. In order to conclude a sale and purchase agreement, You will be required to fill in Your full address as well as bank card details if the payment is not made via cash. All the information You provide on the Platform (excluding Your password) is visible to Us to provide You with Our services, continuously improve them and to give an immediate response and support to You when needed. Your phone number and full address will be visible to such Carriers who will carry out the delivery. Sellers will have access to Your full name, phone number, and full address.
Besides communicating via e-mail and phone, You can message Us through the Platform. All the communications between You and Us will be recorded and stored in order to analyze and improve Our services including customer service as well as to file and/or defend any claims and/or legal actions.
We use information, including without limitation personal data, that You provide or We collect to provide, improve and enhance the Platform, to ensure Your compliance with the Terms of Use.
The legal grounds for Our use of personal data is Your consent to such use (which you grant by accepting this Privacy Policy) and contract (namely – the Terms of Use) we require to use the personal data to provide You with the services of the Platform (in accordance with the Terms of Use of the Platform).
The list of personal data that We may collect, or You can provide Us is subject to change at Our sole discretion, provided that such changes are necessary to ensure Your efficient use of the Platform. You will be promptly notified on such changes through the Platform and will be offered a possibility to reject those changes. Please be informed, that if You disagree with the changes in this Privacy Policy, including what personal data we collect and how we process it, Your only redress is to unregister, stop using the Platform, withdraw your consent and/or exercise your right to be forgotten. Otherwise, if You continue to use the Platform it will signify Your explicit and irrevocable consent to be bound by this Privacy Policy.
Information Collected via Use of the Platform
Via Service Features
We may collect Your information in connection with interactive features of the Platform, such as when You opt to receive notifications or other communications from Us, send messages through the chat service of the Platform or post a product review.
Via Use of Interactive Links
We may collect information about Your interests and engagements based on your own activity and navigation on the Platform.
The Platform displays information about third party offers, services, and other third-party material, which generally incorporate advertising or promotional links (icons) to third-party mobile applications, websites or services, as well as potentially to other services offered by Us. By clicking such links (icons) You will be directed to the corresponding app, website or service, or a corresponding marketplace or other linked resource, while We may gather and analyze statistics of Your access via such links on aggregate basis.
Via Log files
When You access Our Platform, We collect standard information about Your computer/device, such as Your IP address, browser type and operating system version. We use this information to help diagnose any possible problem and occurrence for the better user experience and customer support, to administer the Platform, and to improve its quality. The information gathered during general browsing of the Platform is used to analyze trends and usage of the Platform and to improve its usefulness. This information may also be used to gather broad demographic information that does not personally identify You. Particularly, GoldCenter may determine Your country and other physical location (on the level of region or city) based on the information received from each connection for the purposes of enhancing the services offered to You via the Platform.
Via Cookies and AI
The Platform uses “cookies”, which are small chunks of information that are stored by Your browser on Your device’s hard drive. The cookies are used to improve the user’s own experience on Our Platform.
Use of the Information We Collect
In general, We collect, store and use Your information to provide You with a safe, smooth, efficient, and customized experience to buy Products on the Platform. We do not sell any personally identifiable information volunteered on the Platform to any third party without prior consent.
We may use information collected from You (a) to contact You about Your use of the Platform, such as for administrative purposes or to provide You with customer service; (b) to fulfill or respond to Your requests and to send You the notification on the Platform updates and changes or other communications You requested; (c) to provide technical support and respond to Your inquiries; (d) to notify You about important changes to Our policies, (e) to analyze Your interests (including Your interest towards the products and services), as well as inform You regarding new and existing features, products and services, and special offers, promotions and events that We think You may find interesting and for other marketing, informational and promotional purposes; (f) to gather statistical data on Your use of the Platform and analyze it, (g) to request feedback and to improve the Platform, and develop new products and services, (h) to diagnose Your problems of using the Platform, fix them, improve the Platform and more generally administer it, (i) to expand the scale of services provided through the Platform, as well as more generally to deliver and target special offers and other information via the Platform, (j) to analyze Your interests, taste, preferred type of products or services, most visited places and based on the collected data offer You more tailored and specifically targeted services, offers and benefits, (k) to send you notifications, including push notifications on offers and events that You might be interested in, (l) to tailor which offers are displayed to You through the Platform and how they are displayed, (m) to process payments to and from You in relation to Your transactions performed via the Platform, (n) to prevent fraud or potentially illegal activities, and enforce this Privacy Policy and Terms of Use of the Platform.
Furthermore, We may use the information for any other lawful purposes in a form of broad demographic information or aggregated information that does not personally identify You.
Disclosure of Your Information
Third Party Service Providers
We do not store Your credit card details, but these are provided to licensed electronic payment service providers, who receive the data included directly to manage the payment process on Our behalf. This information is under no circumstances stored on Our servers. You may request such providers’ privacy policies at any time. We may use third party companies to perform services related to the Platform. Accordingly, We reserve the right to disclose Your personal data to such service providers. These services may include, but are not limited to, maintenance services, data storage, database management, data analysis, web analytics, hosting services, customer services and email services. They are obligated to use this information only to perform tasks on Our behalf.
Third Party Advertising
We do not share Your personal data with third party advertisers for their direct marketing purposes unless You give Us Your consent. However, We may use, store and share with third party advertisers certain technical information (including IP addresses) or aggregated information of the users of the Platform such as general demographic and preference information. We may also allow advertisers to collect such technical or aggregate information that they may share with Us. Such information may be used for industry analysis, demographic profiling and other similar purposes to deliver advanced user experiences.
Third Party Tools
The Platform may also contain third party tracking tools from service providers. The Company may use these third parties’ application program interfaces or software development kits in the Platform, which may enable these third parties to analyze user information. While these third parties may have access to Your Personal Data in connection with the performance of services for the Company, they may not use such information for any purpose other than providing their services.
Transfer to Cloud Servers
To ensure safe and secure storage, all the information collected via the Platform will be stored on third party cloud servers located in other country.
Safety, Security and Compliance with Law
Your personal data and other information may be accessed and monitored as necessary to provide access to or use of the Platform and may be disclosed: (i) when We have a good faith belief that We are required to disclose the information in response to a legal process (for example, a court order); (ii) to satisfy any applicable laws or regulations (iii) where We believe that the Platform is being used in the commission of an illegal activity, including to report such activity or to exchange information with other parties for the purpose of fraud prevention; (iv) when We have a good faith belief that there is an emergency that poses a threat to the health and/or safety of You, another person or the public generally; and (v) in order to protect the rights or property of GoldCenter, including to enforce Our Terms of Use.
Transfers to affiliates
As part of Our international operations, We may transfer the information, including the Personal Data You provide or We collect to Our Affiliates from time to time for Our legitimate business purposes.
Change of Ownership
In the event GoldCenter undergoes a restructuring, liquidation or sale of all or a portion of its assets We may transfer all or part of Your information, including personal data, to the successor organization or person in such transition.
Other Disclosures We may share Your information when You agree to Our sharing of such information with other third parties for their own marketing purposes subject to their separate privacy policies. We may share aggregate or anonymous information about You with advertisers, publishers, business partners, sponsors, and other third parties.
Updating Notification Preferences
If You wish to stop receiving push notifications, You can opt out by adjusting the corresponding settings in the phone. Similarly, You can opt out from receiving newsletter by clicking the ‘unsubscribe’ button in the footer of the email.
Access, change, erasure, restriction of Your Information
Users may have the option to review, update, correct or delete their personal data they registered within the Platform or otherwise provided to Us. If You wish to review or change the aforementioned information, the Platform provides You with a built-in option of doing so. However, You will generally need to contact Us in order to access, review, update, correct or delete the personal data that We collected ourselves, or which You provided to Us outside the built-in option of the Platform.
Please note that modifying or deleting certain information may lead to Your inability to use the Platform. Moreover, please note that modifications or deletions may be subject to Our review.
At any time of Your use of the Platform You have the right to request and obtain from Us confirmation as to whether We are processing any personal data, as well as information and details on such processing and request to have access, if possible, to Your information. Such right of access can be exercised in accordance with applicable law on data protection. Please submit corresponding requests to Goldcenter585@gmail.com. Place “Request for Access of Information” in the subject line and include Your first name, last name and e-mail address, along with the details of your request, in the body of the e-mail.
You have the right to request review, change or rectification of the information the Company has about You, if You deem that the information, including personal data is incorrect, incomplete, misleading, injurious or does not correspond to reality in any way or for any reasonable reasons. For the information provided using the built-in option of the Platform, you can perform the review, change or rectification yourself through the same feature. In case such features do not function properly, as well as for other information, please e-mail Us at Goldcenter585@gmail.com. Place “Request for Review of Information” in the subject line and include Your first name, last name and e-mail address, along with the details of your request, in the body of the e-mail.
Right to be forgotten. Users have the right to obtain from Us the erasure of their personal data without undue delay as well as the right to restrict the processing of information in the manner they deem necessary and appropriate. The erasure and restrictions of personal data shall be performed in accordance with the applicable law on data protection. Please submit corresponding requests to Goldcenter585@gmail.com. Place “Request for Deletion of Information” in the subject line and include Your first name, last name and e-mail address, along with the details of your request, in the body of the e-mail.
We will attempt to accommodate any of Your requests within a reasonable period if We do not have any legal obligation to retain the record. However, please note that certain records, for example those pertaining to customer service matters and payment processing, may need to be retained for legal or compliance purposes.
Data security
Any information provided to Us by Users of the Platform is held with the utmost care and security and will not be used in ways other than as set forth in this Privacy Policy or to which You have explicitly consented. We employ a range of techniques and security measures to protect the information maintained on the Platform from loss, misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure, alteration or destruction.
However, no website or Internet transmission is completely secure, and We cannot guarantee that unauthorized access, hacking, data loss, or other breaches will never occur. Also, We cannot guarantee the security of Your data while it is being transmitted to the Platform (including, without limitation, when transmission occurs via messaging), and any transmission is at Your own risk. Accordingly, GoldCenter cannot be held liable if such breaches occur.
Period of information processing
Please, note that the personal data You provided to Us will be stored as long as You are registered on the Platform. However, after You unregister from the Platform, it will not result in deletion of Your information from Our system or servers. Your information, including personal data can be collected, stored, analyzed, changed, disclosed or otherwise processed by Us without any time limitations, permanently and on regular basis, unless You withdraw Your consent in accordance with this Privacy Policy. At that, once you withdraw Your consent, We will stop the above-mentioned forms of processing, with the exception of the storage of Your information and its further use only if it is necessary to file and/or defend any claims and/or legal actions or in order to comply with the applicable law or fulfill Company’s legal obligations. By way of illustration, without limitation, the communication between You and Us will be stored for one year and the concluded transactions through the Platform will be stored for five years.
Complaints and applicable law
This Privacy Policy and any relations arisen from or in connection with it shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Armenia.
Any issues that You might have regarding the processing of Your information, including personal data, by Us shall be addressed to Us in written form and resolved through negotiations. In case of failure of resolving the disputes through negotiations, You have the right to apply to the supervisory authority on such matters, the Personal Data Protection Agency of the Republic of Armenia or other state authority.
Contact Information
If You have any questions about this Policy or processing of Your information, please feel free to contact Us online through the Platform or by e-mail at: Goldcenter.am@gmail.com (updated 30/11/2022).

terms_of_use.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_of_use.content:
“We, Company” means “Armgoldcenter” LLC (a company registered and operating under the legislation of the Republic of Armenia, registration number: 264.110.1239170, TIN: 08224318, legal address: Kanaker-Zeytun, K. Ulnetsi str. 74, Republic of Armenia) as well as the assigns of the latter and its affiliates, which make the Platform available to Sellers, Buyers and Service Providers.
“Platform” means the www.goldcenter.am website through which Sellers are given the opportunity to present and sell Products, and the Buyers have the opportunity to view, choose and buy those products.
“Product(s)” means gold and/or silver products (with or without precious gems, artificial gems) including jewelry, watches, coins, bars, antique products as well as any other similar product available on sale on the Platform.
“Carrier” is a person implementing the delivery (international transportation) of Product from the Seller to the Buyer.
“Seller” is a vendor registered on the Platform as such, and offering and selling Products on the Platform.
“You, Buyer” is any person using the Platform (except for Sellers), including any person registered on the Platform as such, and placing an order on the Platform with the aim of concluding a sale and purchase agreement.
“Parties” means Seller and Buyer jointly, each separately also referred to as “Party”.
You can freely browse the Platform without making purchases and without creating an account on the Platform. In such case the relationship between You and Us will be governed only by these Terms.
These Terms also constitute an unalienable part of the contracts which are being executed on the Platform between Us and Buyers, Us and Sellers, Buyers and Sellers (represented by Us).
To Buyers, Sellers and Service Providers
If making a purchase, You will need to, in addition to these Terms, conclude a contract with the Seller. We will act as the agent acting on behalf of the Seller when executing the contract. The Contract will be signed by You consenting to the contract (accepting it) on the Platform. These Terms will form an integral part of such a contract. If you do not agree with any of the contract terms, you should abstain from consenting to it and from making a purchase.
Prior to making a purchase, You need to create an account on the Platform. You will be required to provide personal data for the registration. By using the Platform, You give your consent to the processing of your personal data and You acknowledge and agree to the terms set forth in the Privacy Policy. As a Buyer, You are required to provide complete and accurate personal data and keep it up to date as We are not liable if the delivery cannot be carried out or other damages occur because of outdated, wrong or incomplete information. We do not check the accuracy of the information provided by You.
To register, You will receive a code via SMS, which You will further use to create a password for your account. You will use your password You created to log in the Platform. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and not sharing it with other persons. We are not responsible for any consequences that may arise in connection with the use of Your account by other persons. You are fully responsible for all activities that occur with the use of Your password to log in the Platform.
By logging in and using the Platform, You give your consent to receive all required notices and information through the Platform.
We exclude our liability and that of our agents and independent contractors, and our and their employees, officers, agents for actions/inactions, errors, omissions as well as for damages relating to your access to the Platform, whatever the legal basis of such liability would be, to the extent permitted by the applicable law.
We are not responsible for the inaccuracy of the information provided by the Seller and/or the Buyer, as well as for checking their financial condition, goodwill, business reputation and any other information about them, as well as for the performance of the obligations arising from the sale and purchase agreement concluded between the Seller and the Buyer. We are not responsible for the actions/inactions, errors, omissions of the Sellers or Buyers or for damages caused to You. We do not warrant that Product descriptions or other content available on the Platform is accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free.
Delivery
Through the Platform we allow Buyers to buy Products from Sellers. We also perform or organize delivery thereof in the territory of Armenia at the expense of the Buyer.
In case of delivery to other countries, such Delivery will be performed by a Carrier. Neither we nor the Seller are responsible for the actions and omission of the Carrier, and neither we nor the Seller can guarantee proper delivery of the Products by the latter. The delivery is only available in countries listed in the Annex to these Terms. We carry out the delivery on Sellers’ behalf and at Sellers’ expense. Usually the delivery (carriage) will be organized by the Seller for a separate fee. However, if you purchase Products from more than one Seller at once, then you automatically instruct Us to order the delivery on your behalf and sign on your behalf a contract with the Carrier. The prices of the delivery will be notified to you during the purchase, prior to your payment for it. Other terms of the carriage/delivery will be per the then current conditions of carriage/delivery offered by the Carrier (FedEx of similar carriage company). We will not be able to renegotiate or change such terms.
In Armenia the delivery in the territory of Yerevan is performed within 24 hours (excluding non-working days) and delivery in the regions (including from regions to Yerevan and vice versa) is performed within 72 hours (excluding non-working days). Delivery (carriage) outside of Armenia will be performed per the timelines ensured by the Carrier, taking into account also the timeline for transferring the Products from the Seller to the Carrier and the customs clearance.
Buyers are solely responsible for providing the correct addresses for delivery on the Platform, and they therefore release GoldCenter and the Carrier from any liability for negligence or error in the delivery of the order as a result of providing an incorrect address for delivery. In this case, the Carrier at his own discretion can return the product to the initial collection address with subsequent refund or deliver the product to the new address mentioned by the Buyer within one (1) day starting from the first delivery date. As a result of the foregoing, the cost resulting from providing an incorrect address for delivery on the Platform shall be borne by the Buyer.
If the Buyer is not at the place agreed for delivery within ten (10) minutes from the arrival of the courier, the courier may at his own discretion return the product to the initial collection address or arrange another date and time with the Buyer for delivery within one (1) day starting from the initial delivery date, payable additionally per the applicable delivery rate.
GoldCenter will, as an extra service subject to a separate fee, prior to the delivery of the Products, check the compliance of the external layer of gold products to the declared gold content, as well as check the existence of content hallmarks. Upon such checks We will guarantee the correspondence of the external layer of gold products to the declared gold content.
Payment
The payment for the purchase includes the cost of the product, and our agency fee as Sellers’ agent. The delivery fee, the Carrier fees, our fees as your attorney in fact in executing the contract with the Carrier (if applicable). You can make the payment via bank card online at the time of making the order or with cash at the time of delivery (if delivery is made in Armenia) or pick up from the Seller.
Amount of cash payments is limited under Armenian law, and for some purchases they may be unavailable. We do not store Your bank card details, but these are provided to licensed electronic payment service providers, who receive the data included directly. This information is under no circumstances stored on our servers. You may request such electronic payment service providers’ privacy policies at any time.
Rating
After making a purchase and receiving the Product, Buyers will be asked/requested to evaluate the purchase. Based on Buyers’ evaluations, ratings of Sellers will be generated and displayed on the Platform. The rating will also be affected in the event the Buyer makes a purchase, but the Product is not available for sale. We are not responsible for any consequences the displaying of relevant data and/or ratings may have, including, but not limited to, the effects on Seller’s business reputation, business opportunities and business relationships.
We may suspend the access of any Seller and/or Buyer to the Platform on the basis of complaints presented against them by other Sellers and/ or Buyers, as well as in case of any violation by them of these Terms or any contract executed via the Platform.
Risks / Limitations
Your access and use of the Platform may be interrupted from time to time for several reasons, including, without limitation, the malfunction of equipment, periodic updating, maintenance or repair of the Platform or other actions that We, in our sole discretion, may elect to take. In no event will We be liable to any Party for any loss, cost, or damage that results from any scheduled or unscheduled downtime. Moreover, the use of the Platform largely depends on the operation of the internet network. Accordingly, we cannot guarantee the availability of products and services due to the possible unavailability of Internet connection or other failures of that network. We undertake reasonable efforts to ensure continuous and uninterrupted performance of the services. However, we are not responsible for any interruption of the operation of the Platform, if it is due to the actions of third parties or to the work of the Internet. We are also not responsible for any interruption of the operation of the Platform or any other problem associated with the Platform, if it is the consequence of the effect of a computer virus or other malicious software.
The Platform is provided on "as is" and "as available" basis without express or implied representations or warranties of any kind, including but not limited to representations or warranties related to the operation, accessibility, availability, completeness, accuracy or suitability of the Platform for any purpose. You are fully and exclusively liable for any and all risk resultant from the use of the Platform.
We are not responsible if the Seller and the Buyer do not conclude a sale and purchase agreement if in the future, even if by the request of one of the Parties technically We notify the other Party on the cancellation of the order or carry out such cancellation on the Platform. We are also not responsible if the Seller and/or the Buyer and/or the Carrier violates the conditions of the concluded agreement, terminates it, refuses to perform it and/or violates the requirements of the RA legislation in connection with such agreement.
When You make a purchase, You might receive a message that the product is not available at the time. In such case You will be requested to wait longer than the time period specified on the Platform to receive the product. Alternatively, You may request a refund.
Return
If the law or the specific Seller allows for such an option, You may request a return of the product of proper quality and refund of the paid amount excluding the delivery fee. The delivery fee (including the Carrier’s fees) is not refundable. In any case We will not organize or anyhow partake in the return process.
In case the Product is of improper quality, You have the right to terminate the sale and purchase agreement or to claim replacement or proportional reduction of the purchase price or gratuitous elimination of defect of the product or compensation for the expenses that You incurred for the elimination thereof. The exercise of the right will be conducted with the terms and procedure prescribed by the RA law unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
Copyright
You must not use the Platform in any way if it causes or may cause damage to the reliability or availability of the Platform. You must not use the Platform to copy, store, post, transmit, send, use, publish or distribute any material which consists of (or is linked to) any computer virus or other malicious computer software. You must not conduct any systematic or automated data collection activities on or acts in relation to them without Our express written consent.
The content (information, images, video, etc.) of the Platform is provided by Us. Copyright and other intellectual property rights in and to the Platform belong to Us or to entities who cooperate with Us. All rights are reserved, and the content of the Platform cannot be in any way modified, distributed, displayed in any manner or by any means, including but not limited to electronic, mechanical means, photographing, downloading or recording without Our prior written permission.
Trademarks placed on the Platform constitute Our intellectual property, legal protection of which is provided by the RA legislation and relevant international treaties.
We do not assume any responsibility for third party content (including any products available for sale, and information relating to such products) that may be available through the Platform, and for content linked to the Platform. Where We link to third party websites/applications, You use such websites/applications at your own risk. We recommend reading the policies of these websites/applications and reviewing how they may process your personal data.
General Terms
When You log in the Platform and/or use it You confirm that You have read and understood these Terms and agree to abide by them.
We have the right to change these Terms and any policy applicable to this Platform. These changes are valid from the date of installation of it on the site of the Platform. If you continue your use of this site it shall mean that You have accepted these changes.
In case of any disputes arisen between You and Us, such disputes shall be subject to settlement through direct negotiations between You and Us within a 30-day period. In case of failure to reach an agreement within the provided period the disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Armenian courts under the legislation of the Republic of Armenia. Upon the agreement between You and Us, the dispute may be submitted to mediation or arbitration.
Contact Information
If You have any questions about these Terms of Use, please feel free to contact Us online as specified within the Platform or by e-mail at Goldcenter.am@gmail.com (updated 30/11/2022).
The purpose of creating the page is to exclude, if possible, the spread of fakes in the jewelry field. On their side, photos of those fake jewelry that meet with entrepreneurs registered on our website are posted.
